verbose_text: Upon NIR laser irradiation, PTT can directly kill the cancer cells in the primary tumor sites and lymphatic metastasis via hyperthermia, or even eradicate cancer stem cells and tumor initiating cells, thereby inhibiting their further metastasis in distant organs XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR.
evidence: PTT can directly kill the cancer cells in the primary tumor sites and lymphatic metastasis via hyperthermia, or even eradicate cancer stem cells and tumor initiating cells, thereby inhibiting their further metastasis
